column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Amazing place! Spain is one of my favorite countries in the world and I was glad to be there as it almost felt like I was in Spain. It must be the smell of jamon haha. Anyway... My friend and I ordered white classic sangria
column2: which was so good! I'd definitely recommend and also paella valenciana
column5: didn't finish the paella because we were already so stuffed on tapas
column6: so we ended up taking most of it to go. Overall I'd give 10 out of 10
